description: Milestone management for organizing work into project phases
notes: Query and create milestones via Linear GraphQL API
Think in phases when building initial backlog
Comprehensive milestone API documentation in linear-integration.md
Updated linear-workflow skill with milestone handling
upgrade_instructions: Run the install script with --update flag
During /docflow-setup, you'll now be prompted to create milestones
During /capture, you'll be asked which milestone to assign
